rules_text:
If X'Mor is in your opening hand, you may begin the game with it on the battlefield.
When you cast this spell, if you control fewer than two creatures, you may put a number of creature cards equal to the difference each with mana value 3 or less from your hand onto the battlefield.
Retrofit {2}{G}{G} [i](You may cast this from the battlefield for its retrofit cost. It's a 4/4 artifact creature and loses retrofit.)[/i]
